Welcome to tapestry-rio module

Introduction

Rio is a great way to deploy and manage distributed services. The tapestry-rio module is meant to ease the development of Tapestry applications acting as Rio clients.

This module reuses the @ServiceAssociation annotation that Rio provides, in order to give a consistent behaviour between associations of services and associations of services and clients.

Usage

After you complete the setup instructions, all you have to do in order to associate your Tapestry pages/components with Rio services is to add the @ServiceAssociation annotation on your fields/getters.

Here is an annotated example:

@Inject
@ServiceAssociation(name = "My Service", serviceType = MyService.class)
private MyService myService;
